titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Public Interfaces Committee, Yale University Library, Records
Public Interfaces Committee, Yale University Library, Records
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Tuesday April 23, 2019 at 08:14

did.unittitle: Public Interfaces Committee, Yale University Library, records

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of electronic files documenting the changes made to the library web site ("Front Door") by the Yale Library Public Interfaces Committee (PIC).

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 32-E (YRG 32-E), Records of Yale University Library programs, projects, and committees.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The records were transferred from the Public Interfaces Committee, 2004-2005.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access is partially restricted. See inventory for details.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Public Interfaces Committee, Yale University Library, Records (RU 976). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by accession.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The Public Interfaces Committee (PIC) of the Yale University Library is charged with improving the usability of the library's electronic interfaces, with particular emphasis on the maintenance, ongoing evaluation, and design of the library's online catalog and web site.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of electronic files documenting the changes made to the library web site ("Front Door") by the Yale Library Public Interfaces Committee (PIC).

did.unittitle: Website files documenting Public Interfaces Committee [computer files]
Web site files documenting Public Interfaces Committee (PIC)
did.physdesc: 4372 computer files (HTML, JPG, GIF, TXT, XLS, PDF, DOC)

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Contact Public Services (phone: 203 432-1735, e-mail: mssa.reference@yale.edu) for information on accessing this digital object.

did.unittitle: Website of the Yale University Library front door [computer files]

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.
